025package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.key;
026
027import org.jetbrains.annotations.Contract;
028import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
029
030import java.util.UUID;
031
032/**
033 * An interface that is the key to subscribe {@link com.github.siroshun09.event4j.listener.Listener}
034 * to {@link com.github.siroshun09.event4j.bus.EventSubscriber}.
035 */
036public interface Key extends Comparable<Key> {
037
038    /**
039     * Creates a new key.
040     *
041     * @param name the name of key
042     * @return the new key
043     */
044    @Contract(value = "_ -> new", pure = true)
045    static @NotNull Key create(@NotNull String name) {
046        KeyImpl.checkString(name, "key name");
047
048        return new KeyImpl(name);
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * Creates a new key.
053     * <p>
054     * The key name is {@code namespace:value}
055     *
056     * @param namespace the namespace
057     * @param value     the value
058     * @return a new key
059     */
060    @Contract(value = "_, _ -> new", pure = true)
061    static @NotNull Key create(@NotNull String namespace, @NotNull String value) {
062        KeyImpl.checkString(namespace, "namespace");
063        KeyImpl.checkString(value, "value");
064
065        return create(namespace + ":" + value);
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Creates a new key with the random string.
070     * <p>
071     * The random string is generated by {@link UUID#randomUUID()}.
072     *
073     * @return the new key
074     */
075    @Contract(value = " -> new", pure = true)
076    static @NotNull Key random() {
077        return create(UUID.randomUUID().toString());
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Gets the name of this key.
082     *
083     * @return the name of this key
084     */
085    @NotNull String getName();
086}
